basics.name: Jessie Stiles
basics.label: Engineering Technician
basics.summary: Driven engineering technician with a wide range of experience in system design, industrial robotics, control systems, and continuous improvement with experience ranging from contract small scale manufacturing to large scale industry. I excel in bridging the gap between design and implementation, having had ample experience working with both production and engineering staff. Eager for new skillsets, projects and techniques.

work.name: C&W Services
work.summary: Installation and maintenance of automation and robotic systems at an Amazon facility.
highlights: Repair and programming of autonomous mobile robots

work.name: Machinic Garden LLC
work.description: Small scale manufacturing and prototyping services
work.summary: Contract engineering and manufacturing services. Specialized in prototype development and integrating a wide-array of machining and production processes.
highlights: Electrical testing (EoL PCB testing, through hole and SMT soldering, DMM/oscilloscope/VNA analyzer)

work.name: Tradesmen International
work.summary: Worked as an industrial contractor, handling various mechanical, electrical, and automation tasks at large-scale facilities
highlights: Configured stress testing for wind turbines. Installed and calibrated a variety of sensors including lasers, accelerometers, and ultrasonic equipment.
Implementation and troubleshooting of low and medium voltage systems

volunteer.summary: Community garden project in Anderson, SC. They coordinate with various churches and food banks, host community events, and are actively working on building renovations to further support the local community.
highlights: Coordinated with Clemson university organizations and volunteer groups, assisted in project management and direction of volunteer efforts and community events.
Assisted in the design and implementation of various irrigation systems, rainwater collection and distribution, and gardening methods.
Implemented remote sensor monitoring for temperature, humidity, and water collection; integrated with irrigation.
Currently refining process for hydroponics system and mycology collection.

awards.title: OpenSauce 2024 Presenter
awards.summary: An event for engineers, student groups, open source developers, makers, and startups to exhibit something they've been working on. You hear my application on the Safety Third podcast here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NeMPYlnSd-g&t=5884s

references.name: Lucy Moglia (864) 617-4908
references.reference: Engineer at Machinic Garden and Atopile Research Fellow.
